the

Roost

Our small offering of space and a warm place, where all are always welcome, whether to smell some freshly baked goods or chew off an ear.

There will always be our inhouse foccacia, cookies, cakes or any other number of magical items to roll out the oven ready to greet you - and two big smiles.

Dirty Boots
